english.segment1: You have captured me. More than life itself You've moved me. How I long to bow. At the feet of the One who saves me
english.segment2: Jesus, thank You for the Cross. Savior, the One who sets me free. Jesus, thank You for Your blood. Jesus, Jesus, thank You for life. Thank you for life
english.segment3: You stole Heaven's heart. In your pain You pleased Your father. Angels stood in awe. While You carried the shame for me
english.segment4: Oh Jesus, thank You for the Cross. Savior, the One who sets me free. Jesus, thank You for Your blood. Jesus, Jesus, thank You for life
english.segment5: Oh, there's nothing great that You haven't done. Than to lose Your life to gain my soul. There is nothing that compares to this. No, nothing, no, nothing
english.segment6: Jesus, Savior, Redeemer. Thank You for the life, oh..
english.segment7: Jesus, thank You for the Cross. Savior, the One who sets me free. Jesus, thank You for Your blood. Jesus, Jesus, thank You for life, oh..
english.segment8: Jesus, thank You for the Cross. Savior, the One who sets me free. Jesus, thank You for Your blood. Jesus, Jesus, thank You for life. Thank You for life.
